thread.title: Vale says Samarco should resume operations by year-end or early 2019

title: Vale says Samarco should resume operations by year-end or early 2019
text: February 28, 2018 / 6:42 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago Vale says Samarco should resume operations by year-end or early 2019 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read RIO DE JANEIRO, Feb 28 (Reuters) - Executives at Brazilian miner Vale said on Wednesday that the Samarco mine may resume operations around the end of this year or in early 2019, but cautioned that the process depends on obtaining environmental licenses. Work at the Samarco mine, a joint venture between Vale and Australia’s BHP Billiton, was halted after a tailings dam burst in November 2015, killing 19 people and unleashing Brazil’s worst environmental crisis. (Reporting by Alexandra Alper)
